mapper.select: select a.id,a.cate_id as 'articleCate.id', a.collect_time,a.status, b.*,c.name 'articleCate.name',b.member_id, (CASE WHEN (SELECT id FROM tbl_archive_favor WHERE archive_id=b.archive_id AND member_id=#{loginMemberId}) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) isFavor from tbl_article as a LEFT JOIN tbl_archive as b ON a.archive_id = b.archive_id LEFT JOIN tbl_article_cate as c ON a.cate_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_action_log where type=1 and foreign_id = #{id}; delete from tbl_article where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_article set cate_id=#{cateId} where id = #{id}
update tbl_article set status=(CASE WHEN status=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) where id = #{id}
